 981          MCChainRot1.W = 0.33333 * WeightChain 
 982          MCChainRot2.W = 0.33333 * WeightChain

 987 -    def RunMC(self, ScoreFn, NSteps, MCMoves, 
 988                Ti = 0.01, Tf = None, TargetAcc = None,  
 989                StepFn = None, StepsUpdateMax = None, StepsUpdateTemp = None, 
 990                KeepMin = False, Verbose = False): 

 991          """ 
 992          Runs a MC algorithm using the current protein. 
 993   
 994          ScoreFn must be a function of two variables, a ProteinClass object and 
 995          a residue number; residue number will not be None only if the side chain 
 996          of the given residue is changed and nothing else. 
 997   
 998          NSteps is the total number of move attempts. 
 999   
1000          MCMoves is a list of MCMoveClass objects, initialized to the current protein. 
1001   
1002          Ti,Tf are the initial and final temperatures. 
1003   
1004          TargetAcc is the overall target acceptance ratio, for temperature adjustment. 
1005   
1006          StepFn will be run after each step and will be sent the following arguments: 
1007          the ProteinClass, the step number, the current T, and a list of the current 
1008          move classes. 
1009   
1010          StepsUpdateMax gives the interval for updating all of the maximum deflections. 
1011   
1012          StepsUpdateTemp gives the interval for updating the temperature. 
1013   
1014          KeepMin will remember the minimum scoring structure, substituting it at the end. 
1015   
1016          Verbose will provide detailed stats about the simulation. 
1017          """ 
1018          #setup temperatures 
1019          if Tf is None: Tf = Ti 
1020          lnTi = numpy.log(Ti) 
1021          dlnT = (numpy.log(Tf) - numpy.log(Ti)) / float(NSteps - 1) 
1022          T = Ti 
1023          #make the move probabilities 
1024          x = numpy.sum([m.Active() * m.W for m in MCMoves]) 
1025          if x == 0: 
1026              raise IndexError, "No available MC moves." 
1027          MCMoveProbs = numpy.array([m.Active() * m.W / x for m in MCMoves], float) 
1028          #setup target acceptance probabilities 
1029          if TargetAcc is None: 
1030              TargetAcc = numpy.sum([m.TargetAcc * m.W for m in MCMoves if m.Active]) / x 
1031          #prepare and perform the steps 
1032          Ret = [] 
1033          OldE = ScoreFn(self, None) 
1034          MinE = OldE 
1035          MinEPos = self.Pos.copy() 
1036          NAcc, NAtt = 0., 0. 
1037          for m in MCMoves: m.Reset() 
1038          for n in range(NSteps): 
1039              #fraction done 
1040              FracDone = float(n) / float(NSteps - 1) 
1041              NAtt += 1. 
1042              #get temp 
1043              if not Tf == Ti: T = numpy.exp(lnTi + n*dlnT) 
1044              #random move type 
1045              m = MCMoves[pfunc.GetRandomInd(MCMoveProbs)] 
1046              NewE, AccFact = m.Make(self, ScoreFn, OldE, FracDone = FracDone) 
1047              Acc = numpy.exp(min(0., (OldE - NewE) / T + AccFact)) > numpy.random.random() 
1048              m.Accept(self, Acc) 
1049              if Acc: 
1050                  NAcc += 1. 
1051                  OldE = NewE 
1052              #update parameters 
1053              if not StepsUpdateMax is None and (n+1) % StepsUpdateMax == 0: 
1054                  for m in MCMoves: 
1055                      m.Update() 
1056                      m.Reset() 
1057                  if Verbose: 
1058                      print "Fraction accepted is %.4f versus target is %.4f" % (NAcc/max(NAtt,1.), TargetAcc) 
1059                      print "Ds updated to [" + ",".join(["%.4f" % m.D for m in MCMoves]) + "]" 
1060              if not StepsUpdateTemp is None and (n+1) % StepsUpdateTemp == 0: 
1061                  T = T * (TargetAcc + 0.1)/(NAcc/NAtt + 0.1) 
1062                  if Verbose: 
1063                      print "Fraction accepted is %.4f versus target is %.4f" % (NAcc/max(NAtt,1.), TargetAcc) 
1064                      print "Temp updated to %f" % T 
1065                  NAcc, NAtt = 0., 0. 
1066              #update minimum energy structure 
1067              if KeepMin and OldE < MinE: 
1068                  MinE, MinEPos = OldE, self.Pos.copy() 
1069              #run the step function 
1070              if not StepFn is None: 
1071                  v = StepFn(self, n, T, MCMoves) 
1072                  if not v is None: Ret.append(v) 
1073          #update structure 
1074          if KeepMin: self.Pos = MinEPos 
1075          #return the data 
1076          if len(Ret) > 0: return Ret
